reviews.text: This place has fantastic pizza. The owner Charlie is amazing. He always does it. Perfect with just a little bit extra sauce when we‚Äôre out taking care of the elderly we stop and get them pizza from this place and they just love it. Fantastic owner great guy. great food stop by and see Charlie. They will take care of you here.!

Raya's Pizza

GOOD: Solid neighborhood business.  The pizza, wings and hoagie were very good.

BAD:  Overpriced condiments and messy take out prep - no impact on food quality.

Raya's was a nice surprise.  As an out of town visiter (born and raised near philly) I am picky with pizza quality.

Raya's delivered, the first thing that stands out is a perfect, stiff crust.  The sauce is very flavorful.  A pinch more salt in the cheese - then solid A.  The wings are tender, juicy and the garlic parm sauce was very good.  The Gyro hoagie had tasty meat and feta.  The toasted roll was great.

I had to knock 1 star on a collection of things.  The sauces for 1.50 - customers expect a dip with wings.  At 1.50 it feels more like a premium pizza topping and I can buy a small bottle of ranch for 1.99.  Include one sauce and raise your price 25 cents?

Messy prep for take out - all the food was delicious, but the wing sauce got everywhere.  It leaked right though tissue paper, the box AND the bag.  Line the boxes with foil - big savor.

The hoagie tasted great, but rather than a total slice through, creating two halves (where toppings fall out hard core)  deep slice the side and stuff the roll.  It acts to hold the toppings - Eastern PA Wawa trick.

I would definitely order from Raya's again, either way.

This pizza isn't very good. The sauce has basically no taste. The Italian hoagie is ok but not great.  After trying 3 different items from this outdated and dusty restaurant I would not return. They also charge 1.50 for a cup of ranch?!

Raya‚Äôs is my favorite place for local pizza. Always fresh, hot, the best ingredients, and delivery is always so much faster than they quote on the phone. Thank you for letting us order directly without going through a third party delivery company!

Ordered a door dash Sicilian pizza because this place has been there forever, so thought we should give it a try. It was just passable. The dough was very much bread like, no significant chew or crunch. (it was delivery, so not deducting a lot for that!) Sauce was too sweet for our taste. Got extra cheese and pepperoni, neither was too generous. Maybe we'll try the thin crust sometime, but that sauce makes me doubt it'd be worth it.

recentReviews.author: Christopher Hughes
recentReviews.text: Ordered a door dash Sicilian pizza because this place has been there forever, so thought we should give it a try. It was just passable. The dough was very much bread like, no significant chew or crunch. (it was delivery, so not deducting a lot for that!) Sauce was too sweet for our taste. Got extra cheese and pepperoni, neither was too generous. Maybe we'll try the thin crust sometime, but that sauce makes me doubt it'd be worth it.

recentReviews.author: Emily mitko
recentReviews.text: This pizza isn't very good. The sauce has basically no taste. The Italian hoagie is ok but not great.  After trying 3 different items from this outdated and dusty restaurant I would not return. They also charge 1.50 for a cup of ranch?!

recentReviews.text: Raya‚Äôs is my favorite place for local pizza. Always fresh, hot, the best ingredients, and delivery is always so much faster than they quote on the phone. Thank you for letting us order directly without going through a third party delivery company!

neutral.text: Ordered a door dash Sicilian pizza because this place has been there forever, so thought we should give it a try. It was just passable. The dough was very much bread like, no significant chew or crunch. (it was delivery, so not deducting a lot for that!) Sauce was too sweet for our taste. Got extra cheese and pepperoni, neither was too generous. Maybe we'll try the thin crust sometime, but that sauce makes me doubt it'd be worth it.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customer opinions are divided. The 3.8/5 rating from 5 recent reviews suggests some great experiences mixed with areas needing attention.

strengthsPerceived: Customers appreciate the flavorful sauce and perfect, stiff crust of Raya's pizza, which stands out even to picky eaters - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The delivery service at Raya‚Äôs is consistently faster than quoted, impressing customers with its speed and reliability - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

Customers value being able to order directly from Raya‚Äôs without a third-party delivery service, appreciating the convenience and personal touch - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews about the taste and quality of the sauce and overall food experience - review management can address this concern
Complaints about messy takeout prep and overpriced condiments - social media marketing can improve this area
Outdated and dusty restaurant ambiance perception - social media marketing can improve this area
